edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_1

Class Gun

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_1.Gun

  • public class Gun
extends java.lang.Object
    The Gun class is where the basic attributes and properties of a default gun is stated so a constructor can utilize this class and give more precise values to the properties an attributes.
    Author:
    thefurryman

      static int accuracyRNG()
      The random number generator which all guns use when firing at a target.
      void createGun(java.lang.String name)
      The primary method where are guns are created and assigned specified attributes based on selected gun.

      This will get the accuracy itn int of the current gun being used.
      int getAmmo()
      This method will return the number of ammo in int that is being used

      Overloaded reload method where user is asked in MainUI to enter a custom amount of ammo to be reloaded.
      void reload(java.lang.String gun)
      The primary reload method where guns will be fully reloaded of its ammo.
      void shoot()
      The shoot method which, when used, will subtract 1 ammo from the equiped gun and add a text effect.

      • reload

        public void reload(int x)
        Overloaded reload method where user is asked in MainUI to enter a custom amount of ammo to be reloaded. The amount entered will be added to the remaining ammo.
        Parameters:
        x -

      • accuracyRNG

        public static int accuracyRNG()
        The random number generator which all guns use when firing at a target. Max = 100, Min = 0. If the randomly generated number is less than or equal to the gun's accuracy, the target will be successfully shot.
        Returns:
